thread.title: “Please Address Him As Taimur Ali Khan” – Kareena Kapoor Is Upset With Rumours Of Renaming Her Son
thread.title_full: “Please Address Him As Taimur Ali Khan” – Kareena Kapoor Is Upset With Rumours Of Renaming Her Son

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: “Please Address Him As Taimur Ali Khan” – Kareena Kapoor Is Upset With Rumours Of Renaming Her Son
text:
Read » Bollywood » News & Gossip 
“Pl ease Address Him As Taimur Ali Khan”– Kareena Kapoor Is Upset With Rumours Of Renaming Her Son Sukriti Gumber Mar . 3 . 2017 Kareena Kapoor 
A lot has been said about Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan ‘s beautiful baby boy, Taimur Ali Khan, and it’s pretty sad that a new born’s name became a public debate. Recently, there were reports that Bebo has nicknamed her son, little John. 
But Kareena recently clarified the rumours and denied keeping any such nickname for Taimur. She told HT: 
I want to clarify that. How can anyone think that? Why would I call my son Little John? My son’s name is Taimur. It is the most beautiful name, and he is the most beautiful and gorgeous man. And, no, I don’t call him Little John. Please address him as Taimur Ali Khan. 
There you have it! No more trolls, we hope! 18
